author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Automatically resize the Pixel FED buffer used by `SiPixelRawToClusterCUDA` to construct a contiguous copy of the FED data to be copied to the GPU.

The value of the `MaxFEDWords` is used as the starting size of the buffer, but not as a hard limit.


#### PR validation:

Tested on events from run 355872 that would crash with a segmentation fault or raise an exception, because the Pixel had a larger occupancy than expected.
With these changes all crashes disappear.

#### If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

To be backported to 12.4.x for data taking.
title: Automatically resize the Pixel FED buffer used by SiPixelRawToClusterCUDA
